Implement the two CTA buttons with the exact link targets from the provided HTML: “PLAY NOW” navigates to `samp://15.235.185.4:7785` and “JOIN DISCORD” navigates to `https://discord.gg/Rzj3NMB7`.
Create a “Server Status” UI element that initially displays “Checking...” and then updates to “ONLINE” on the client side (mirroring the behavior of the provided inline JavaScript).

Apply a cohesive visual theme inspired by the provided design: dark navy page background, bright cyan accent color, centered layout, rounded cards with subtle translucent backgrounds, and modern typography. Ensure it remains readable and looks good on mobile and desktop.
